text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @ICEgov Trump and campaign want to hold rallies in spite of the deadly virus, and his chief of staff Mark Meadows and son-in-law Jared Kushner are urging him to move on past COVID-19 and talk about what he’d do in a second term, but some officials have begged him to focus on the pandemic
